name: unified-extension-for-safe-browsing
description: 1. Open Chrome and navigate to `chrome://extensions/` 2. Enable **Developer mode** (toggle in top-right corner) 3. Click **Load unpacked** 4. Select the folder: `d:\Unified-Extension-For-Safe-Browsing` 5. The extension icon üõ°Ô∏è should appear in your toolbar
